title: Realisation
message:
Hi mutka bubu,
From yesterday I have understood to trust your instinct and tell my expectations upfront where I feel you are not able to get them and support you to the maximum. I will work on it, but I want you to also take something from this and communicate even better to avoid miscommunications and clear things up. love you 
to infinity and beyond together

title: ROSE DAY
message:
Happy rose day to my mutka bubu,
I am sorry I am not there to give you a rose physically, but I thought of creating this messaging app for us. Love you, I will welcome you with roses when you come back to make up for this.

title: Thank you for tolerating me
message:
Hi Mutka Bubu,
I want to apologize for how I constantly keep troubling you day by day and not giving you breathing space. Please bare with me for some more time; I will return to being more calm and someone who is worth putting up with
